Html:
Well, many of us are developing intranet/internet sites based on ClubStartKit. I think, it would be great, if all we write down the add-ons/plug-ins/changes we made to CSK. So we can bring them together and make CSK more powerful (let's join the lions and create Voltron ;)).

I added the followings;
1.) A basic invitation system; admin automatically adds new users based on the e-mail addresses and sends e-mails (username's and passwords) to whom he/she wants to contribute and. admin just enteres the e-mail subject, addresses and message body. The body also contains a link to the login page.

2.) Document management; It is simply a copy of photo albums. The documents are stored in the database for security.

So, what are yours..?

Hi Plaid,

Call me stoopid, but isn't putting together all the add-ons what this CSK 2.0 is all about?
Document management.... great idea! why not add it?

No lexvis...not stoopid. And yes, some more tools to help with document management would be great. A 'delete' function might be a nice starting point.

On a related note: I do have problems finding all the little tweaks in the various source code updates from one release to the next. Is there a 'file compare' function or a simple redline trick that I'm missing that might make keeping up a little easier? Would appreciate any helpful hints.
I would ask that you not put the docs in the db b/c it takes a much longer time to get the docs out of the db.
Ok, maybe with a configuration option, i can give the user a choice, whether hold the docs on db or on file system.
